uas.lntv.pacmangame.Managers

Class PrefManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • uas.lntv.pacmangame.Managers.PrefManager

  • public class PrefManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages all the saved preferences, like high-scores and settings.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PrefManager

        public PrefManager()
        This constructor simply loads the saved high-scores and settings from the preferences. At first startup it will initialize with default settings.

      • anonymous

        private static void anonymous()
        Gives the indecisive player the name "Anonymous Bastard".

      • addScore

        public boolean addScore(int newScore,
                        java.lang.String causeOfDeath,
                        int level)
        This method compares the new score to all values in the high-score list. If the new score is higher than an existing score, it will be put on the right place. The lower scores will increase their positions by one and the lowest score in the list will be deleted.
        Parameters:
        newScore - Achieved score that tries to be put into the high-score list
        causeOfDeath - the reason why the game ended
        level - the level in which the game ended
        Returns:
        boolean value, that tells you whether the score made it into the list or not

      • loadPrefs

        public static void loadPrefs()
        Loads the scores and settings from the preferences folder into the game.

      • resetScores

        public static void resetScores()
        Resets everything to factory settings and clears the high-score list.

      • savePrefs

        public static void savePrefs()
        Safes the updated scores and settings into the preferences folder.

      • setName

        public static void setName()
        Gives the player two chances to insert a name, if he doesn't he will be treated as Anonymous Bastard.
